sentences.en: A homely example of such a system is the electric blanket.
sentences.cn: 这样一种系统的简单典型可举电毯为例.

sentences.en: But enough of this . Homely truth is unpalatable.
sentences.cn: 得了,忠言逆耳,不说这些了.

sentences.en: Come and have a homely meal with us, will you?
sentences.cn: 来和我们一起吃顿家常便饭, 好 吗 ?

sentences.en: He was a dapper little Irishman, very vain, homely as a monkey.
sentences.cn: 他是个短小精干的爱尔兰人, 非常自负, 丑得象只猴子.

sentences.en: He wasn't handsome, not in any conventional sense . Nor was he homely.
sentences.cn: 从传统标准说,他不算漂亮, 也不难看.

sentences.en: He went to the beautiful old Welsh dresser that graced this homely room.
sentences.cn: 他走到为这间舒适的房间增色不少的漂亮的旧威尔士碗橱前。

sentences.en: Her mother is a homely woman.
sentences.cn: 她母亲是个朴实的妇女.

sentences.en: Mrs Keane is a comfortable, homely person.
sentences.cn: 基恩太太平易近人，亲切好客。

sentences.en: Scottish baking is homely, comforting and truly good.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰烘烤食品简单、温馨，吃起来十分美味可口。

sentences.en: The hotel has a lovely homely feel to it.
sentences.cn: 那家旅馆给人一种宾至如归的感觉。

sentences.en: The man was homely and overweight.
sentences.cn: 该男子其貌不扬，身材肥胖。

sentences.en: The terracotta tiled floor gives the place a wonderfully homely character.
sentences.cn: 陶瓦地板使这个地方给人一种非常舒适温馨的感觉。

sentences.en: There are some homely products like a Jeep station wagon.
sentences.cn: 有一些很平常的产品,象客货两用吉普车.

sentences.en: Times are changed and we must, to use the homely metaphor, cut our coat according to our cloth.
sentences.cn: 时代变了,因此, 用朴实的隐喻来讲, 我们必须“适应环境”.

sentences.en: We try and provide a very homely atmos-phere.
sentences.cn: 我们试图营造一种非常舒适放松的气氛。

sentences.en: We try and provide a very homely atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 我们试图营造一种非常舒适放松的气氛。

words.tran_cn: 舒适的，自在的；如在家的
舒适的；家庭似的；自在的
回家的；自动导引的；有返回性的
家，住宅；产地；家乡；避难所
喜欢在家消遣的男人；家庭第一主义的男人

trans.tran_cn: <尤英>家常的，平凡的，<美>（人）不好看的，相貌平庸的
